lines.line: Life knocked me down and left me alone with my tears.
I watched the world go by from my window of despair.
Hidden beneath my bed, I wondered if I'd ever find courage again.
But then I realized - weakness is temporary.
I started with small steps, exploring new territories.
I trained my body to become stronger than yesterday.
I prepared myself for every opportunity.
I learned to take decisive action when it matters most.
Now I stand tall, showing the world what I'm made of.
Because true strength isn't about never falling.
It's about rising from the ashes, more powerful than before.

parsed_script.full_script: Life knocked me down and left me alone with my tears. I watched the world go by from my window of despair. Hidden beneath my bed, I wondered if I'd ever find courage again. But then I realized - weakness is temporary. I started with small steps, exploring new territories. I trained my body to become stronger than yesterday. I prepared myself for every opportunity. I learned to take decisive action when it matters most. Now I stand tall, showing the world what I'm made of. Because true strength isn't about never falling. It's about rising from the ashes, more powerful than before.
